title: Internet service provider market share in Vietnam fourth quarter 2013
summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Market share in each Company on the y axis.
The maximum Market share 56.6 is found at Company VNPT and the minimum is found at Others where Company is 6.6.
The minimum Company Others has got 8.58 times less Market share than the maximum Company VNPT.
min_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Market share in each Company on the y axis.
Company VNPT has the highest Market share and Others has the lowest Market share.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Market share in each Company on the y axis.
The maximum Market share 56.6 is found at Company VNPT and the minimum is found at Others where Company is 6.6.
The minimum Company Others has got 8.58 times less Market share than the maximum Company VNPT.
max_summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Company, and Market share in each Company on the y axis.
The Market share is highest at Company VNPT and lowest at Company Others.
Second maximum Market share is found at Company FPT Telecom.
The Market share of Company VNPT is 8.58% larger than the minimum value at Others.
The Company VNPT has the highest Market share, followed by FPT Telecom, and Viettel. Down to the Company Others which is the lowest.
The average Market share in all 4 Companys is 25.0.
